subject: Re: Maybe there is only one box user allowed!?
author: Lance Oliver
full_text:
Yep!

Lance

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "judy_in_hollywood" 
<Ticket_to_Heaven@...> wrote:
>
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Lisby <lisby@> wrote:
> >
> > 
> > On Dec 3, 2007, at 8:47 PM, judy_in_hollywood wrote:
> > 
> > > ox! Plus, he claims he's acting like a Medium connecting the 
living  
> > > with their departed loved ones (what proof is there of this? 
I'd  
> > > love to hear from my Dad, but may have to wait a LONG time for 
that  
> > > to happen)!
> > >
> > 
> > Again, I've got to speak up and say that I have heard his box, 
the  
> > one Frank gave him, do exactly that. And why in the heck 
shouldn't  
> > it? That is exactly what human mediums--myself included--can do.  
> > Isn't the box just taking it to a potentially purer, higher, and 
more  
> > stunning level?
> > > I'd contact a lawyer - for infringment rights to your device  
> > > (unauthorised use), on a contingency basis (pay if you win the  
> > > lawsuit, from the winnings). Plus, you could get your boxes, 
Sony  
> > > cassette recorder, and Tarot CD back, as well as put him outta  
> > > business, before he does more damage! =Judy= P.S. He may know 
you  
> > > well enought to know you'll never sue him, too (and thus get 
away  
> > > with it)! 8-(
> > >
> > >
> > > _
> > 
> > You can't sue for use of non-patented technology that was a gift. 
It  
> > would be very hard for Frank to prove otherwise.
> > 
> > Ah, but what a hell of a civil trial it would be. There's one 
I'd  
> > love to cover as a reporter....
> > 
> > Ann
> >
>  = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =     Hi All, What's to keep Chris 
from getting a Patent of his own on HIS "Telephone to The Dead"? Does 
Frank have his "Franks Box" Patented by the U.S. Patent Offices (the 
cost is low for this, BTW)???? I think it has merit thus far, for 
Frank to consider a Lawsuit! So what if it was a gift, Frank stated 
it was to be used in 1 place (statonary) & for testing purposes ONLY. 
What Chris has done with it, is Run with it making several businesses 
with it and making a profit from it . . . . this is NOT what Frank 
intended HIS Box(es) to be used as!   =Judy=
>
